name: Earth Story
description:
Team: Chongyi Tang, Jiabin Zhang, Yuqing Xie, Zeduo Ouyang

This is a visual novel game made with Unity as an assignment work during my Game & Playable Media graduate program at UC Santa Cruz.

This time we were require to make a story prompt game including a given twist. So our team decided to simply make a visual novel game, but also embody it with some other mini games. Try to experience this story!
